doc.name: DatabaseQuery
doc.description: Issue a database query via the specified database manager. The output is an array of records, one for each row in the returned result.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: Name of the DatabaseManager to use. This defaults to "DatabaseManager".
An SQL query. This is a string that defaults to "select * from desks", indicating that the all the rows from the desks table should be returned.
